TemplateVersion.readme:
# ğŸš€ Run a Task with Claude Code ğŸ’¥ğŸ’¥

This template lets you quickly prototype *anything* using Claude Code inside a Coder workspace. Just tell Claude what you want to build, and it will generate code, run a development server, and show you a live "previewâ€”all" automatically.

## âœï¸ How to use

1. Create a **new workspace** using the **â€œRun a Task with Claude Codeâ€** template.
2. Fill out:
   - **Workspace Name** â†’ (use a name or accept the suggestion)
   - **AI System Prompt** â†’ describe global settings and parameters you want Claude Code to follow.
   - **AI Task Prompt** â†’ describe what you want Claude Code to build.
3. Click **Create Workspace**.

ğŸ‰ Thatâ€™s it! Your workspace will launch, and Claude Code will start building.

---

## ğŸ’¡ Prompt examples

âœ… â€œBuild a simple hello world website.â€  
âœ… â€œCreate an online sock store app with a product pageâ€  
âœ… â€œMake a website celebrating upcoming holidays with a festive design.â€

You can also leave the prompt blankâ€”Claude Code will ask you what to build after the workspace launches.

---

Your app will run on **port 3000** (accessible via Coderâ€™s preview link). You can send additional instructions inside the workspace terminal to keep improving your project.

TemplateVersion.readme:
# ğŸš€ Run a Task with Claude Code ğŸ’¥ğŸ’¥

This template lets you quickly prototype *anything* using Claude Code inside a Coder workspace. Just tell Claude what you want to build, and it will generate code, run a development server, and show you a live "previewâ€”all" automatically.

## âœï¸ How to use

### To run a task.

1. Navigate to the **[Tasks](https://ai.coder.com/tasks)** tab.
2. Type in your prompt that you'd like Claude Code to run.
3. Click the bottom-left dropdown and select **"Run a Task with Claude Code"**

### To build on

1. Create a **new workspace** using the **â€œRun a Task with Claude Codeâ€** template.
2. Fill out:
   - **Workspace Name** â†’ (use a name or accept the suggestion)
   - **AI System Prompt** â†’ describe global settings and parameters you want Claude Code to follow.
   - **AI Task Prompt** â†’ describe what you want Claude Code to build.
3. Click **Create Workspace**.

ğŸ‰ Thatâ€™s it! Your workspace will launch, and Claude Code will start building.

---

## ğŸ’¡ Prompt examples

âœ… â€œBuild a simple hello world website.â€  
âœ… â€œCreate an online sock store app with a product pageâ€  
âœ… â€œMake a website celebrating upcoming holidays with a festive design.â€

You can also leave the prompt blankâ€”Claude Code will ask you what to build after the workspace launches.

Your app will run on **port 3000** (accessible via Coderâ€™s preview link). You can send additional instructions inside the workspace terminal to keep improving your project.
